mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.name, c.discount, c.regdate, c.expirDate, c.expirYN, cd.state AS cdstate, cd.useDate AS cdusedate, cd.userId AS cduserid FROM coupon c INNER JOIN coupondetail cd ON c.id = cd.id WHERE c.id = #{id}
